title: Nell and Fred
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, George C. Stoney, Colin Lun and Richard Todd
brief_description: Penetrating look at an issues that confronts many people when age and infirmity make them vulnerable. Nell and Fred must choose between doing for themselves or moving under the restrictive car of an old folks home. Their decision will arouse sympathy and understanding.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, George C. Stoney, Colin Lun and Richard Todd
